SAMRAI::tbox

Stream Toolbox Classes

These classes provide basic support for portable message and file streams, and the abstract interface for all stream-based interprocessor data communication in the SAMRAI library.

  • SAMRAI::tbox::AbstractStream
  • SAMRAI::tbox::FileStream
  • SAMRAI::tbox::MessageStream
  • SAMRAI::tbox::XDRStream
